thread.title: Ram Mandir consecration will be celebrated: VHP VP | Mysuru News
thread.title_full: Ram Mandir consecration will be celebrated: VHP VP | Mysuru News - Times of India

title: Ram Mandir consecration will be celebrated: VHP VP | Mysuru News
text: MYSURU: Vishwa Hindu Parishad vice-president Jagadeesh Hebbar on Friday said members of right wing organisations, including Sri Rama Janma Bhoomi Theeratha Kshetra Trust, have made preparations to celebrate Prana Prathistapan Mahotsav, the consecration ceremony of Sri Ram Mandir at Ayodhya on January 22.\"The event will be celebrated in a grand manner,\" he said. He asked Hindus to light lamps facing north.Speaking to reporters, he said members of the organisations have made all preparations to provide wide publicity to the event as the temple will be inaugurated after five decades of struggle. \"As Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other leaders are taking part in the event, right wing organisations have also given a call to Hindus to celebrate the day like a festival,\" he said.Big LED screens will be put up in more than 25 locations in several wards in the city to watch the ceremony which will be held between 11am to1.30pm.The activists will also undertake a 15-day door-to-door campaign distributing Mantrakshate, a portrait of Sri Ram and Sri Ram Mandir from January 1.

persons.name: sri rama janma bhoomi theeratha kshetra trust
